notes.body: Users in India and nearby areas should be seeing improvements with loading their messages, but weâ€™re still monitoring closely. Please let us know if you are still experiencing issues.

Customers in India and nearby areas may be experiencing some issues loading messages. We are still investigating and we'll report back once we have more information to share.
Apologies for the inconvenience in the meantime.
